content: CP681 SD-FD Cast-in sleeve for firestopping shower and floor drain systems ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Accessories for firestop & fire protection- - - ### FEATURES:Features Durable PVC construction (ASTM 2665) Material can be attached to PVC pipes via solvent welding or glue Two variations (1) extended sleeve and (2) hub coupling Applications Cast-in device for firestopping shower and floor drain systems For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Height: 5-13/32 in LEED VOC: 1.4 g/l Application temperature range: 23 - 122 °F Technical Data | LEED VOC | 1.4 g/l | Application temperature range | 23 - 122 °F ### ITEMS- 295521 - Shower Drain - Package Size 10 pc
